MonteCarlo: (singleIsoMuPass || singleEPass || singleESingleMuPass || singleMuSingleEPass || doubleMuPass || doubleEPass || tripleEPass || tripleMuPass || doubleESingleMuPass || doubleMuSingleEPass)
SingleMuon: ((singleIsoMuPass) && !(singleEPass || singleESingleMuPass || singleMuSingleEPass || doubleMuSingleEPass || doubleESingleMuPass) && !(doubleMuPass || tripleMuPass) && !(doubleEPass || tripleEPass))
